extendedInfo.description: The Digital Pan Mobile App is the only steelpan (steel drum) app that is officially and exclusively endorsed by the world governing body for the steelpan - Pan Trinbago. Thank you for helping us in making Digital Pan the "#1 Steelpan App" of Trinidad and Tobago.Â This innovative app features instant access to the entire range of the steelpan family, including the tenors, double guitars, double tenor, double seconds, four cello, three cello, tenor bass and the six bass. The app offers the opportunity to experience the diverse richness of the national instrument of Trinidad and Tobago and the only percussive instrument created in the 20th century.â Ten (10) steelpans included: Low C Tenor, High C Tenor, Double Tenor, Double Guitar, Double Seconds, Three Cello, Four Cello, Tenor Bass, Six Bass and Junior Steelpan;â Record your songs;â Supports multitouch. You can now play chords using multiple fingers;â Play background tracks while you play the pan;â Learn the musical names of the notes on the steelpan;â Play the steelpan using the built-in piano keyboard;â Keep a list of your favorite recordings;â Supports tablet devices including the Galaxy S I, II and III and the Kindle Fire;â and much more...._____________________________HIGHLIGHTS_____________________________The following features are included in this version of Digital Pan:â Ten (10) steelpans included: Low C Tenor, High C Tenor, Double Tenor, Double Seconds, Double Guitar, Three Cello, Four Cello, Tenor Bass, Six Bass and Junior Steelpan;â Steelpan notes professionally recorded in high-quality 16-bit stereo;â Supports multitouch. You can now play chords using multiple fingers;â Track recorder that allows you to save, load, and play recorded tracks;â Display the names of the notes on the steelpan;â Play the steelpan using the built-in piano keyboard;â Supports tablet devices including the Kindle Fire;Play along with your favourite music by easily accessing your phones music right from within Digital Pan.Fun and easy to play for the musician in all of us!_____________________________COMING SOON_____________________________When you download Digital Pan you are entitled to free product updates and we are pleased to announce that in the next major release for Digital Pan we will be including the following features:â The ability to give your own names to your recordings;â More steelpans including: a quadraphonic steelpan;â More keyboards for : double tenor, four cello, six bass, double guitar, double second, three cello, tenor bass;If Digital Pan does not work on your device, email us and we can add support for your device in our next release._____________________________ABOUT DIGITAL BUSINESS LTD_____________________________Digital Business is a leading Caribbean management and technology consulting company committed to helping companies create knowledge and deliver innovation. Our team of experienced consultants offers breakthrough e-business, knowledge management and consulting services solutions that allows governments, leading organizations and small and medium-sized enterprises to create, share and apply knowledge that helps them to deliver innovation and transform their business. In a commitment to create, share and apply knowledge with innovation intrinsic to the core of their business, digital business has used ingenious thinking and collaborative team work to build their very own mobile applications. Now users can enjoy more ground-breaking inventions through our mobile apps.

reviews.title: Had fun playing on it!
reviews.comment: Really enjoyed playing notes on the virtual pan - it is very responsive to touch and the notes are real sounding. You can also play intervals. Arrangements can also be recorded. Well done. On version 2.0 a way should be created to share recordings over social sites though.  And if the notes can be displayed on all pans for those who don\'t have perfectly tuned ears like myself. Lol. But great app.
reviews.author: Jonathan Francis

reviews.title: Good. BUT..
reviews.comment: I really like this app, but not all pans have the exact same layout. My double seconds are different so it would be nice to be able to customize the pitches on the pan. And PLEASE make this app work horizontally to enlargen the drums!
reviews.author: Stefan cowley

reviews.title: Cool!!
reviews.comment: Quite responsive and gives me the ability to practice without a personal pan, although the layout is different from what I\'m accustomed. One issue, the pans are a bit too small for my fingers, so it would be cool to flip the pan horizontally or make them bigger.
reviews.author: Kara Rashida Goddard

reviews.title: Makes me want to play the pan again!
reviews.comment: I was a double second player in school, after I graduated, that was pretty much it for me and pan playing. But now I can get a taste of it again thanks to this app. It feels great,  and the songs can be recorded too!   Love the app, very innovative! Kudos to the developers!
reviews.author: Lauren Jones

reviews.title: Love it But...
reviews.comment: It was a great idea to create this app, I love it, but it needs some work. The pan/s appear on one corner of the screen not cool especially when choosing pans like the seconds and base, it appears even smaller in a corner.
reviews.author: Marcy Sernard

reviews.title: Only for fiddling, not for playing.
reviews.comment: Man, all you people that saying this is any less than 5 stars need to try the \"#1 steelpan app\", it\'s more realistic, versatile and less clunky than this app. Even free, this isn\'t worth the time. If you gave it five stars, then you haven\'t tried anything better. Downloads and endorsement, and especially quantity, do not equal quality. 1 billion can download an app, if all of them uninstall it, it still shows over 1 billion downloads.
reviews.author: Juan Eduardo Saavedra

reviews.title: An awesome app
reviews.comment: This app is amazing .I cannot stop playing this digital steel pan .helps me do school work . I am a native of Trinidad and Tobago so I really enjoy this app :-) :-)  I cannot stop loving this app
reviews.author: Brianna Maraj

reviews.title: Digital steelpan app
reviews.comment: It\'s awesome but needs to be bigger and the notes are in places they not suppose to be in.
reviews.author: Faith Alexander

reviews.title: I will give 5 stars.
reviews.comment: But In my low C my mid e is missing and only getting hi a there plz fix.
reviews.author: Joel Marcano

reviews.title: Love it.
reviews.comment: A must have for any pannist. Efficient.
reviews.author: Cherylee Legair

reviews.title: Lovely
reviews.comment: Applause to this app,but please reconfigure so that individuals with devices that has small internal memory wont have problems opening the app on their phone,configure so that when it installs the user can have the option of transferring app to phone sd card rather tgan phone memory.device internal memo helos device to operate at optimum levels.   From,Vigilant citizen of T&T
reviews.author: Nicholas Bedeau

reviews.title: Samasung galaxy young
reviews.comment: It say error everytime im downloading it please help!
reviews.author: Milli Griffith

reviews.title: Wow....thanks ..Bp..
reviews.comment: For making this great app free..
reviews.author: Timothy Johnson

reviews.title: Works good now
reviews.comment: Works and sounds pretty good. HTC Rezound.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good but needs improvement
reviews.comment: Good app but it needs to be able to rotate on the galaxy tab 2 as well the sensitivity of the notes need to be looked at.
reviews.author: Jelani Edwards

reviews.title: small
reviews.comment: This is small on my 7\" tablet can u fix this
reviews.author: Zuriel Roach

reviews.title: Digital pan (steelpan
reviews.comment: Rate it!
reviews.author: Elijah Johnson

reviews.title: Don\'t download
reviews.comment: This app is made by BP. DONT fund massive earth destroying oil companies.
reviews.author: Hollie Brennan

reviews.title: Learn how to play steelpan
reviews.comment: I like that you can change the type of steel pan eg from tenor to bass. The option to have the notes displayed on the pan means you can learn how to play before tackling the real steelpan. Great for those who wished they could play or compose steelpan music.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: So happy!
reviews.comment: This is a GREAT app for anyone whose played out who owns a pan. Great sound, great features and I love that you can record your music! Wonderful!
reviews.author: A Google User
